products.name: Spell
products.desc: A Spell is a small portable bottle that holds energy and a mystical fragrance.

products.name: Spell Gaia
products.desc: Spell Gaia channels Earth's primal energy, nurturing balance and connection.

products.name: Special Spell

products.name: Potion
products.desc: Magic Potions are bottled spells, working 2-3 times stronger to create desired effects anytime.

products.name: Potion Gaia
products.desc: The magical power is x2 as strong as a regular potion.
